name: Kisah Tentang Racun
description:
A Tale About Poison

An analog collage zine I made during a workshop in Bandung in 2012. The materials are from an article in National Geographic magazine about poison.

I made several copies of this zine, which I sold to friends. But just a few, because the cost of production is expensive.

This zine was created before I decided to focus on collage making, I was still mostly painting at my art practice during that time. But I like to combine images already.
